sentences: Denny Carmassi (born April 30, 1947 in San Francisco, California, United States) is an American rock drummer most notable for playing with many rock bands.
Out of high school, Denny started playing topless clubs in San Francisco.
He joined a band called Sweet Linda Devine, and recorded an album in New York on Columbia, produced by Al Kooper, but before long they parted ways.
Denny went on to work with several local bands in the San Francisco Bay Area and began working with Montrose and Sammy Hagar in the 1970s.
Currently, he performs with Mercy (featuring Lynda Morrison).
